Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • src.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the entire game world (Designed to be instantiated just once for the whole game)

                   int delta,
                   boolean attack)
            throws org.newdawn.slick.SlickException
        Handles object calculations during each update loop
        Parameters:
        xDir - : The player's movement in the x axis (-1, 0 or 1)
        yDir - : The player's movement in the y axis (-1, 0 or 1)
        delta - : Time passed since last frame (milliseconds)
        xDest - : Destination x-coordinate (- 1 if not used)
        yDest - : Destination y-coordinate (- 1 if not used)
